name: generator-node-es2015
description: A Yeoman generator for creating ES2015 JavaScript modules with legacy support using Babel, Webpack, Mocha, Chai, Isparta, ESLint

scripts.release: npm version ${BUMP:-"patch"} --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json && git commit -m ":octocat: Bump to $(cat package.json | json version)" && git tag $(cat package.json | json version) && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
